title: How to unsubscribe from Forbes Ukraine
description: Learn how to cancel your Forbes Ukraine subscription. This guide provides steps for canceling through your account, the Apple App Store, or by contacting customer support.

steps_1.title: Cancel Subscription via Website
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Forbes Ukraine subscription via the website:

*   Go to the Forbes website (forbes.ua).
*   Access your account settings.
*   Find the "Cancel Subscription" section within your account.
*   Click on the "Cancel Subscription" button.
*   Confirm your cancellation request.
*   Check your email for a cancellation confirmation.

steps_2.title: Cancel Subscription via Customer Support
steps_2.description:
Alternatively, you can cancel your Forbes Ukraine subscription by contacting customer support:

*   Contact Forbes customer support for assistance with cancellation.

seo_text: Cancel your Forbes Ukraine subscription quickly and easily. Follow these simple steps to stop recurring payments and manage your subscription preferences. This guide covers online cancellation and contacting customer support.
